# Endpoints

An api client is available:

```bash
npm install @agent-smith/apicli
```

## Commands

The endpoint will require a valid general `api key` or a group api key in the config file.

Execute a command endpoint: `/cmd/execute`:

```js
const api = useServer({
    apiKey: "30f224ea6b45af61356b8eb0bd84d2011f6f85dec6d49716c686cff66510efbb",
    onToken: (t) => process.stdout.write(t),
});
const abortController = new AbortController();
await api.executeCmd(
    "infer", 
    ["Which is the largest planet of the solar system?"],
    abortController.signal,
)
```

To abort a running command:

```js
abortController.abort()
```
